name: Building Blocks - A Playable Resume
description:
Who wants to sit around reading resumes all day, right? BORING!

I give you... Building Blocks, the future of job applications!

Okay, maybe that's a bit hyperbolic, but I hope you enjoy this unique project all the same. This is a playable gallery of my current work history. But, of course, it won't be a walk-in-the-park. It wouldn't be a game without a challenge! You'll find the entries of this gallery scattered over islands of floating platforms. Armed with the ability to place blocks, you'll need to build your own paths their as you discovery my own building blocks!

I've also included the "script" for the game, and maps to help navigate to sections you're more interested in.

To play, simply download the zip file and, well, unzip it! From their, navigate to the folder WindowsNoEditor, and open the Building_Project executable.

Developed by Connor McCloskey in Unreal Engine 4.
